data.prayer: Lord, make the 109,299 believers in Caldas to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 909,201 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Caldas, Colombia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Caldas, Colombia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary: On average, 152 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Caldas, Colombia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 109,299 believers living in Caldas, Colombia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Caldas, Colombia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, teach the 109,299 believers in Caldas that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Caldas, Colombia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Caldas who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Caldas
location.cities_list: Manizales, La Dorada, Chinchiná, Villamaría, Aguadas
location.cities_list_w_pop: Manizales (357,814), La Dorada (81,950), Chinchiná (68,512), Villamaría (35,302), Aguadas (19,727)
